column1: #text=I live in a large city , and while I do have a car , sometimes there is a lack of parking where I need to go .
#text=When this happens or if I think it will be hard to park , I will take the city bus .
#text=They have a very good bus service in our city , and you can get wherever you need to be fairly easily and quickly .
#text=I know riding the bus can be confusing at first , but they make some very easy bus schedules to help people .
#text=I knew where I needed to go , so I took out my bus schedule and found out when the bus I needed to ride would be at the stop near my house .
#text=I went there a few minutes early , and right on time , I saw the bus I needed to ride .
#text=I could tell it was my bus by the big number flashing near the top of the bus .
#text=When the bus stopped , I got on and put my money into the coin taker which is near the driver .
#text=I then moved to the back of the bus and chose a seat .
#text=A nice woman was sitting across from me and she smiled and said hello .
#text=I smiled and said hello in return .
#text=People are usually very friendly on the bus .
#text=I rode the bus for several more stops , and then saw my stop coming up .
#text=When the bus stopped , I got off the bus and went to my destination .
#text=It is very easy and convenient to ride the public bus .
